title: 大家能帮忙看看这是怎么回事么
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This is a token for 1 free hug. Redeem at your nearest Mojangsta: [~~HUG~~]

Time: 5/15/15 10:12 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
        at java.util.zip.Deflater.init(Native Method)
        at java.util.zip.Deflater.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.zip.Deflater.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.zip.DeflaterOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.zip.DeflaterOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at ic2.core.network.NetworkManager.sendLargePacket(NetworkManager.java:477)
        at ic2.core.network.NetworkManager.sendUpdatePacket(NetworkManager.java:447)
        at ic2.core.network.NetworkManager.onTickEnd(NetworkManager.java:86)
        at ic2.core.IC2.tickEnd(IC2.java:1797)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.SingleIntervalHandler.tickEnd(SingleIntervalHandler.java:34)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.tickEnd(FMLCommonHandler.java:141)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onPostWorldTick(FMLCommonHandler.java:282)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:892)

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:777)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:659)
        at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(ThreadMinecraftServer.java:16)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- System Details --
Details:

        Operating System: Windows 2003 (amd64) version 5.2
        Java Version: 1.7.0_67, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 1738508488 bytes (1657 MB) / 3849469952 bytes (3671 MB) up to 3949723648 bytes (3766 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xincgc -Xmx3800M

        Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed

        CraftBukkit Information:

   Plugins: { WorldBorder v1.7.5 com.wimbli.WorldBorder.WorldBorder [Brettflan], SimpleBackup v1.4 com.exolius.simplebackup.SimpleBackup [], GroupManager v2.0 (2.12.1) (Phoenix) replies.author: SPE__HaiKuo
replies.txt_content: 内存溢出了，给游戏分配多点内存吧=a=

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 内存溢出，就是要加大内存
